Group.Label: Life Line
Group.Help: Press the button 3 times within 1.5 seconds to add Z-Weather to the network. Z-Weather sends a NIF (Network Information Frame) and waits 4 seconds for inclusion to the Z-Wave network. If no controller includes Z-Weather, it goes to sleep after 4 seconds. Make sure to first instruct the inclusion controller to add a node and then press the Z-Weather button 3 times to add the device to the network.
